articles.title: Rajkummar Rao says Patralekhaa thought he was ‘neech aadmi’ at first, jokes his films are preparation for married life - Hindustan Times
articles.description: On The Kapil Sharma Show, Rajkummar Rao joked that his films are preparation for married life. Reports suggest that he will tie the knot with Patralekhaa next month. | Bollywood
articles.content:
Rajkummar Rao appeared as a guest on The Kapil Sharma Show on Saturday, alongside his Hum Do Hamare Do co-star Kriti Sanon. Host Kapil Sharma teased him about his choice of films.
